parameter.value: I have left the glorious times and entered an era of peace. I now buy equipment... it's a hobby.
Casteldine... it's like music in my ears. I love this town!
I would like to buy armors, weapons, shields, legs and helmets from you. Don't worry, I can afford it.

Nowadays I live a life in peace.

Yeh, I've heard of him. Lived long ago.
